2451 
2454  void SetRecordingsLifetimeValues(const std::vector<std::pair<int, std::string>>& recordingsLifetimeValues)
2455  {
2456  m_capabilities->iRecordingsLifetimesSize = 0;
2457  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_capabilities->iRecordingsLifetimesSize && i < sizeof(m_capabilities->recordingsLifetimeValues); ++i)
2458  {
2459  m_capabilities->recordingsLifetimeValues[i].iValue = recordingsLifetimeValues[i].first;
2460  strncpy(m_capabilities->recordingsLifetimeValues[i].strDescription, recordingsLifetimeValues[i].second.c_str(),
2461  sizeof(m_capabilities->recordingsLifetimeValues[i].strDescription) - 1);
2462  ++m_capabilities->iRecordingsLifetimesSize;
2463  }
2464  }
2465 
2467  std::vector<std::pair<int, std::string>> GetRecordingsLifetimeValues() const
2468  {
2469  std::vector<std::pair<int, std::string>> recordingsLifetimeValues;
2470  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_capabilities->iRecordingsLifetimesSize; ++i)
2471  {
2472  int value = m_capabilities->recordingsLifetimeValues[i].iValue;
2473  std::string str = m_capabilities->recordingsLifetimeValues[i].strDescription;
2474  recordingsLifetimeValues.push_back(std::pair<int, std::string>(value, str));
2475  }
2476  return recordingsLifetimeValues;
2477  }
2479 
2480 private:
2481  PVR_ADDON_CAPABILITIES* m_capabilities;
2482 };

7203 
7204 private:
7205  void SetAddonStruct(KODI_HANDLE instance, const std::string& kodiVersion)
7206  {
7207  if (instance == nullptr)
7208  throw std::logic_error("kodi::addon::CInstancePVRClient: Creation with empty addon structure not allowed, table must be given from Kodi!");
7209 
7210  m_instanceData = static_cast<AddonInstance_PVR*>(instance);
7211  m_instanceData->toAddon->addonInstance = this;
7212  //--==----==----==----==----==----==----==----==----==----==----==----==----==

7358  inline static PVR_ERROR ADDON_GetChannels(const AddonInstance_PVR* instance,
7359  ADDON_HANDLE handle,
7360  bool radio)
7361  {
7362  std::vector<PVRChannel> channels;
7363  PVR_ERROR error = static_cast<CInstancePVRClient*>(instance->toAddon->addonInstance)->GetChannels(radio, channels);
7364  for (auto iter : channels)
7365  {
7366  instance->toKodi->TransferChannelEntry(instance->toKodi->kodiInstance, handle, iter);
7367  }
7368  return error;
7369  }

7371  inline static PVR_ERROR ADDON_GetChannelStreamProperties(const AddonInstance_PVR* instance,
7372  const PVR_CHANNEL* channel,
7373  PVR_NAMED_VALUE* properties,
7374  unsigned int* propertiesCount)
7375  {
7376  std::vector<std::pair<std::string, std::string>> propertiesList;
7377  PVR_ERROR error = static_cast<CInstancePVRClient*>(instance->toAddon->addonInstance)->GetChannelStreamProperties(channel, propertiesList);
7378  *propertiesCount = 0;
7379  for (auto iter : propertiesList)
7380  {
7381  strncpy(properties[*propertiesCount].strName, iter.first.c_str(), sizeof(properties[*propertiesCount].strName) - 1);
7382  strncpy(properties[*propertiesCount].strValue, iter.second.c_str(), sizeof(properties[*propertiesCount].strValue) - 1);
7383  ++*propertiesCount;
7384  if (*propertiesCount > STREAM_MAX_PROPERTY_COUNT)
7385  break;
7386  }
7387  return error;
7388  }

7678  inline static PVR_ERROR ADDON_GetTimerTypes(const AddonInstance_PVR* instance,
7679  PVR_TIMER_TYPE* types,
7680  int* typesCount)
7681  {
7682  std::vector<PVRTimerType> timerTypes;
7683  PVR_ERROR error = static_cast<CInstancePVRClient*>(instance->toAddon->addonInstance)->GetTimerTypes(timerTypes);
7684  *typesCount = 0;
7685  for (auto iter : timerTypes)
7686  {
7687  types[*typesCount] = *iter;
7688  ++*typesCount;
7689  if (*typesCount >= PVR_ADDON_TIMERTYPE_ARRAY_SIZE)
7690  break;
7691  }
7692  return error;
7693  }

7700  inline static PVR_ERROR ADDON_GetTimers(const AddonInstance_PVR* instance,
7701  ADDON_HANDLE handle)
7702  {
7703  std::vector<PVRTimer> timers;
7704  PVR_ERROR error = static_cast<CInstancePVRClient*>(instance->toAddon->addonInstance)->GetTimers(timers);
7705  for (auto iter : timers)
7706  instance->toKodi->TransferTimerEntry(instance->toKodi->kodiInstance, handle, iter);
7707  return error;
7708  }

7790 
7791  inline static PVR_ERROR ADDON_GetStreamProperties(const AddonInstance_PVR* instance,
7792  PVR_STREAM_PROPERTIES* properties)
7793  {
7794  std::vector<PVRStreamProperties> cppProperties;
7795  PVR_ERROR err = static_cast<CInstancePVRClient*>(instance->toAddon->addonInstance)->GetStreamProperties(cppProperties);
7796  if (err == PVR_ERROR_NO_ERROR)
7797  {
7798  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < cppProperties.size(); ++i)
7799  {
7800  memcpy(&properties->stream[i], static_cast<PVR_STREAM_PROPERTIES::PVR_STREAM*>(cppProperties[i]), sizeof(PVR_STREAM_PROPERTIES::PVR_STREAM));
7801  ++properties->iStreamCount;
7802 
7803  if (properties->iStreamCount >= PVR_STREAM_MAX_STREAMS)
7804  {
7805  kodi::Log(ADDON_LOG_ERROR, "CInstancePVRClient::%s: Addon given with '%li' more allowed streams where '%i'",
7806  __func__, cppProperties.size(), PVR_STREAM_MAX_STREAMS);
7807  break;
7808  }
7809  }
7810  }
7811 
7812  return err;
7813  }
